description: Collection of V-Model inputs for various project types and safety levels

examples.name: basic-web-app
examples.learningFocus: Basic V-Model flow for standard software

usage.description: Run these examples to learn V-Model methodology for different safety levels and project types
usage.recommendation: Start with basic-web-app for standard projects, then progress to safety-critical examples

safetyLevelGuide.standard: Regular software projects with standard testing practices
safetyLevelGuide.high: Business-critical applications requiring enhanced testing and traceability
safetyLevelGuide.critical: Safety-critical systems (medical, automotive, aerospace) requiring exhaustive testing and compliance
